mapper.select: select o.id, u.id AS user_id ,p.eng_name,o.delivery_status, s.name as size_name, date_format(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d')as order_date from user_tb as u join order_tb as o on o.user_id = u.id join product_tb as p on p.id = o.product_id join size_tb as s on p.size_id = s.id where u.id=#{userId};

select o.id,p.img_route,u.username, u.id AS user_id ,p.eng_name,o.delivery_status, s.name as size_name, date_format(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d')as order_date from user_tb as u join order_tb as o on o.user_id = u.id join product_tb as p on p.id = o.product_id join size_tb as s on p.size_id = s.id;

select o.id, u.id AS user_id ,p.eng_name,o.delivery_status, s.name as size_name,date_format(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d')as order_date from user_tb as u join order_tb as o on o.user_id = u.id join product_tb as p on p.id = o.product_id join size_tb as s on p.size_id = s.id where u.id=#{userId} AND order_date BETWEEN #{orderStartDate} AND #{orderEndDate};
